expected_policies.justification: No standard cover for specific family event cancellation. Best partial solution via optional CFAR add-on (50% payout). Assumes add-on purchased.

expected_policies.justification: Provides comprehensive golf cover (equipment, green fees, hole-in-one) and potentially superior buggy cover via higher Rental Vehicle Excess (S$1500). Also has better travel delay trigger (4hrs).
Only policy with dedicated 'Golf Cover' section in JSON explicitly mentioning equipment, hole-in-one, unused green fees, and buggy damage (S$500 limit).

match_justification: Provides comprehensive golf cover (equipment, green fees, hole-in-one) and potentially superior buggy cover via higher Rental Vehicle Excess (S$1500). Also has better travel delay trigger (4hrs).
